description:
It’s a musical showdown at the Cultural Fair! Ikaros is the star of the show when Tomoki and the gang put a band together and take on the classical orchestra of the nearby private academy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenshi no Kotoba no Mukau Saki
Where the Melodious Words Of an Angel Go
天使の旋律[ことば]の向かう先
